activities: Telargo Inc. provides asset management services optimized for fleet vehicles and public transit buses. Customer management personnel use the on line Telargo Portal to manage their assets (cars, trucks or buses). Drivers are given Telargo RFID cards to use to logon to the on board units for driver identification associated with a specific vehicle. Personal information received from customers in the EU fall into 2 areas: management personnel names are used to create their Portal logins; and driver names are used to create their RFID logon. In both cases the only personal data obtained are names (both given name and surname) and function (Portal user and/or Driver).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
